definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Since then it has held conferences biennially with sponsorship from host countries and other parties.
sentences.chinese: 自此，主办国和其他人士每两年便赞助举行该会议。

sentences.english: The host nation always performs well.
sentences.chinese: 主办国经常是非常出色的。

sentences.english: The host country has already spent two years preparing the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 主办国已花了两年时间筹备会议。

sentences.english: Who will be the host of the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 主办国已花了两年时间筹备会议。

sentences.english: FIBA will choose the host nation in May.
sentences.chinese: 国际篮联将选择主办国在5月。

sentences.english: China is the host of The Eleventh Asian Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 中国是第十一届亚洲奥林匹克运动会的主办国。

definition: the right to host (an international meeting)
Olympic organizing committee/abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會|奥林匹克运动会组织委员会
host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
abbr. for 國際足球聯合會|国际足球联合会, FIFA, international federation of football associations

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Sochi (city on the Black Sea in Russia)
